body.p: An action is defined by fields:

ul.li: Name: name for identify this action.

Time between task start and start this action: It's the time when action will start after the task is beginning. If there is 10 minutes, task start at 1 hour am and this action begin at 1 hour and 10 minutes am.Always have a minimum an action of each task with this value set to 0.
Number of trials: It's possible to define number of trials if there is errors on execution of the task.
Time between 2 trials (in minutes): Number of minutes between 2 trials.
Module: Module defined the action (WakeOnLan, Inventory, netdiscovery...). These modules come from each plugins fusinv[...] installed.
